attributes.action: To allow for the Importation and distribution of 'STEVIA' a natural Sugar
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allowing'STEVIA' a NATURAL PLANT SUGAR to be imported and used
     in this country without the interference and medelling  'Big
     Sugar Companies' who lobbied against it's introduction here! It
     would also help OBESE people to charter a new course into a
     healthier diet as 'STEVIA' has no ill effects on Teeth or diet
     as it's very low in Carbs and is a 'CLEAN SUGAR'
